website_summaries.verdict: Covers a variety of materials in a well-organized manner.  Materials aren't appropriate for all states, though.
pros: Touches on all key aspects of preparing for the real estate exam
Author has extensive experience with testing programs
Can work through the book quickly, as materials are to the point
Focuses primarily on info for national test
cons: Only 80 questions on the practice exam
Doesn't go into much detail in any particular area

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good book. It help me to learn more about the Real Estate Exam
customer_reviews.author: GM

customer_reviews.title: It is for the National portion of the test, not state portion of the test. Only purchase if you intend to use it to pass the Nat
customer_reviews.text: I purchased under the assumption that this book covered the PSI (state) portion, it does not. It is for the National portion of the test. I wish I could get a refund. Only purchase if you intend to use it to pass the National portion.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Garbage! This books is no good for the Jersey test, NY yes, Jersey no. I already have my license in NY so I'm speaking from experience.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie M.

customer_reviews.title: Very Helpful
customer_reviews.text: This book helped me pass my RE state test after failing 2 times. After I read this book, I easily passed my course with a 98.
customer_reviews.author: T. Ran

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Book- I Passed
customer_reviews.text: This is a good book because it covers everything there is to know about real estate although it's not state specific it still touches on basic knowledge that every real estate agents should know no matter what state you're in. It also provides great information for the national portion of the test.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It's like real estate text book. Nothing special. It's not for Virginia Praxis text.
customer_reviews.author: Faliha

customer_reviews.title: Unnecessary additional purchase for RE exam
customer_reviews.text: It was not as helpful as I thought it would be, I advise reading the first book you purchased, this was simply a regurgitation. If you did not purchase the actual book, than this is helpful because it summarized everything, don't let the instructed talk you into buying both, only one is necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh

customer_reviews.title: This is all I used
customer_reviews.text: Great book. I'm an attorney in Colorado, so I got to take the short education course, which doesn't include anything for the national section. This book was the only thing I used. Read it in about 4 hours, got 75/80 on the national portion. To the reviewer who said there's not enough on the state portion, the book explicitly says it does not cover the state portion. There is a lot of overlap, but you need to make sure you understand trust accounts, closings, powers of the RE commission, the broker/licensee relationship, and the Colorado forms.
customer_reviews.author: atilley

customer_reviews.title: My review
customer_reviews.text: Good book but seems dated. I think I will stick with the literature from my online course. However this is a good supplement. ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Damon

customer_reviews.title: Is ok
customer_reviews.text: I barely pass the national test today. I didn't used this to study but there are some questions here that were definitely in the test. I used CompuCram and psi 2017 to study. I feel like there really isn't a good study guide. But using all of these books definitely helps.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and great book from this shipper
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and great book from this shipper. Definitely helped with all the national test questions and got me in the 95% percentile on my first round of the exam
customer_reviews.author: Matt O.

customer_reviews.title: Reviewer not taken the test yey
customer_reviews.text: Excellent source. I'm still studying. Did not take the test yet to give final reviewed. When I finish the rest will write again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Read reviews carefully
customer_reviews.text: It’s okay but not as beneficial as I was hoping for. I had to get some more resources to get prepared for my certification.
customer_reviews.author: 1intraining

customer_reviews.title: Everything is sequenced as it’s supposed to be.
customer_reviews.text: This has contributed my passing my Real Estate Exam. I will endorse this book to everyone. The concise summary of the course is absolutely amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Angela L

customer_reviews.title: Two weeks with this book helped me pass the first time!
customer_reviews.text: If you don't have a lot of time, or a lot of money to sped on an exam prep class, then get this book and it's state companion. Very concise, straight to the point and very effective for exam preparation.
customer_reviews.author: BRIAN BORDENAVE

customer_reviews.title: Real Estate Exam Prep (PSI)-excellent choice!!!
customer_reviews.text: The Real Estate Exam Prep book was extremely helpful in preparing for my real estate exam. The information is laid out in a manner that is quite easily understandable. The book also contains practice tests at the end so as to allow one to become familiar with the wording and format of the test questions. I highly recommend this book!!
customer_reviews.author: Leticia Sahagun

customer_reviews.title: Great study guide
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to find something that would help me review for my state real estate licensing exam and I am so glad I came across this book. It even followed the basic outline that I had received from my state! Although not state specific, it gives you the information that you need to know and the sample test in the back is asked in the same way that the state test was. Helped me pass my test on the first try. Highly recommended if your state uses PSI to administer their test.
customer_reviews.author: Trudi J.

customer_reviews.title: Comprehensive Review
customer_reviews.text: Very good review tool for the exam. The only thing I found lacking is that it did not include sample questions that had lengthy fact patters, which appeared on my exam.
customer_reviews.author: Carl E Tugberk

customer_reviews.title: GREAT WAY TO GET READY FOR MD GENERAL PORTION
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed this book was easy to understand gave me everything I needed to pass my exam and more. I am truly happy to have found this book and able to understand the points being taught. I passed my MD Exam which I struggled with before I found this book.
customer_reviews.author: Purple

customer_reviews.title: This book was helpful. I passed the exam. ...
customer_reviews.text: This book was helpful. I passed the exam. The National part of the exam was easier than the State part due to studying this book.
customer_reviews.author: sonic123

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not written well or clearly. Too much of the authors perspective.
customer_reviews.author: Skip J.

customer_reviews.title: This book was good for tests with the other book I chose I ...
customer_reviews.text: This book was good for tests with the other book I chose I passed in a week only missing 4 on the test
customer_reviews.author: Kent

customer_reviews.title: Real estate license prep
customer_reviews.text: Kindle book. Good value. Covers material contained in exams for all states. Easy to navigate. Arranged well with clear explanation
customer_reviews.author: eli

customer_reviews.title: I made it with this!
customer_reviews.text: Helped alot!!!! For NJ test. Better then book I got already from class. But for pre test purpose I recommend buy real book. Not Kindle
customer_reviews.author: miyoungsmith

customer_reviews.title: Great General Overview
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Wish the State RE Commission manual was written by this author! Very easy to follow and read with some excellent tips. I passed both the National and State exams today. This book was well worth the money. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: lynne dolan

customer_reviews.title: Not state specific
customer_reviews.text: I was under the impression that this document also had my state specific information. It does NOT. Otherwise I thought it was good information.
customer_reviews.author: Gregbish

customer_reviews.title: Thank you passed test
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help new to be agents study for the exam. One of them had failed and when they first started reading this book the called to say "WOW the questions I missed popped out here!!" and of course they passed with ease and fast as others have done. This book is part of the office's library!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Real Estate Broker

customer_reviews.title: I really Like this exam prep
customer_reviews.text: I have to say that I am very happy with this exam prep. It was very informative for the national portion of the real estate exam. I was so happy to get it in the Kindle edition. I was able to take it with me everywhere and study. This prep covers what is most important, plus it gives a nice exam at the end that will help you see where you are lacking and need to study more. This is by far a fantastic deal. I do not regret this purchase at all. Now I have this to go back and look up things whenever I need it. I passed the exam with flying colors and in only 1 hour!!.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Clayton

customer_reviews.title: Great supplemental product
customer_reviews.text: This guide was instrumental in helping me pass my exams first time. It familiarizes you with how the test is laid out and has several huge tips on how to take the exams. If it wasn't for the information in this guide, I'm sure I wouldn't have done as well as I did. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: It only gives one sample test 😒
customer_reviews.text: this download only gives you one sample test and no explination for the correct answer, and check your score with the grid is not ideal
customer_reviews.author: terri

customer_reviews.title: Great book. Really good at specificall narrowing down on ...
customer_reviews.text: Great book. Really good at specificall narrowing down on what to study. I would not have passed the PSI real estate exam without it.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Choice!!
customer_reviews.text: If you happen to the first, this is the book you need. Language is clear and concise, yet the pricipales points you need to know. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: nancy

customer_reviews.title: great book
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tool to prepare for the national exam. I recommend it to everyone. It is concise and elucidative.
customer_reviews.author: R.R.

customer_reviews.title: great resource!!
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed this book and the exam prep. It quizzed me rather then just sticking me with a bunch of words. I was able to pass my test with a few other apps and books.
customer_reviews.author: Rene

customer_reviews.title: Overall good.
customer_reviews.text: I have read this book and it is very helpful but I would recommend taking an online course in your state. Some things may not be accurate due to ever changing laws in real estate. Annie
customer_reviews.author: Monica Cooke

customer_reviews.title: Not enough information for state portion of exam
customer_reviews.text: The book provided a fairly good review for the national portion of the exam, but information for the state portion was lacking.
customer_reviews.author: Clancy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Exactly how it looks! Perfect for what I needed. Much appreciated and a highly recommended item. THANKS!
customer_reviews.author: Girly Girl

customer_reviews.title: Passed Immediately After Reading!!
customer_reviews.text: Even though this is the 2009 version, this book helped me tremendously on the 2015 PSI exam. I passed my exam immediately after reading this book. The author is SO accurate. It's straight to the point. You HAVE to read everything, including his tips!!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Kind

customer_reviews.title: Complicated Book
customer_reviews.text: I bought this book because I am retired and considering getting my realtor's license. I didn't like the way the book was laid out. Too much emphasis on what would likely be on a realtor's exam. It has a lot of information but it's very stuffy reading. I don't know, maybe I'm expecting too much out of a book. I just didn't like it.
customer_reviews.author: Perry P Diamaduros

customer_reviews.title: Skip this one
customer_reviews.text: Out of date, not indexed. Online test prep resources are much better. Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Kay Arnold

customer_reviews.title: joke didnt help at all!!!
customer_reviews.text: dont waste your money this did not help at all!!! not worth buying. I ended up having to buy other study guides.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette M Caceres

customer_reviews.title: Terrible book. Not any good for California real estate ...
customer_reviews.text: Terrible book. Not any good for California real estate exam. The book throws out real estate terms without any definitions. Don't waste your time ordering this book.
customer_reviews.author: mulan

product_meta.title: Real Estate Exam Prep (PSI): The Authoritative Guide to Preparing for the PSI General Exam (On-the-Test: Real Estate Series)
